title.narrative: To help HMG improve the quality of cross government International Policing Strategy & Engagement

description.narrative: This activity (To help HMG improve the quality of cross government International Policing Strategy & Engagement) is a component of International Policing programme reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £616,665. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Public sector policy and administrative management. , with the following implementing partners: College of Policing, Crown Agents Limited, DCAF, Geneva Centre for the Democratic Control of Armed Forces (DCAF), Palladium International Ltd (UK). The start date is 05-04-2016 and the end date is 31-05-2021.

participating-org.narrative: Geneva Centre for the Democratic Control of Armed Forces (DCAF)

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Public sector policy and administrative management
